result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
result.translation: 13.Too digaala korosut kah tekkem diggah usun Yallaa kee kay farmoytih amri cineenimih sabbata, Yallaa kee kay farmoytih amri cina mari, toysa diggah Yalli gibdi digaala keenih Íe addunyaay akeeral.
